job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building applications that span both front-end and back-end, which is a hallmark of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of the entire product lifecycle from development to deployment falls under the umbrella of software development responsibilities.
Developing applications that are powered by AI, especially web applications, directly involves creating and integrating AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the act of designing and writing code for web applications, encompassing both front-end and back-end development.
Working with AI technologies and experimenting with them is a core aspect of model development and innovation.

job_tasks.phrase: specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions working with LLMs and creating tools and features using them, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: Owning the development process from start to finish, including requirements, launch, and iteration, is a key responsibility in software development.
Gathering requirements is a crucial step in understanding business needs and translating them into technical specifications.
Launching and iterating on products are fundamental activities within the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring solutions meet user needs is a direct link between technical work and business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform
job_tasks.justification: Applying advancements in web development to a platform is a direct software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: integrating both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Creating comprehensive and scalable solutions by integrating different aspects (front-end and back-end) is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI
job_tasks.justification: Leveraging expertise in AI to translate ideas into products points to the development and implementation of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: Full-stack development explicitly refers to the creation of web applications across all layers, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: Developing and delivering AI applications directly relates to the implementation and use of AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
Collaborate with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing AI-powered web applications using LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude. It highlights responsibilities such as prompt engineering, creating interactive features with AI, and integrating these capabilities into full-stack applications, aligning strongly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
